placement_training.question: Whom should I contact for LITCODER, LITQ or training related queries?
placement_training.keywords: litcoder, litq, psychometric test, berribot, job prep, training, summer internship, certifications, placement training
placement_training.response: For these queries, write to training.cdc@vitap.ac.in

placement_training.question: Whom should I contact for placement and CDC portal queries?
placement_training.keywords: cdc portal, mock test, placements, interview venues, transcripts, verification, final internships, internship marks
